title: Serif font similar to museo needs Id'ing
content:
Can't quite pick which font the "relaxation" is.

Also, if you have any idea what the other fonts are, that would be great.

Sorry for the image, it's the best I could find.

Any help would be appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158im_/http:/typophile.com/files/noa_4443.jpg)

Font: 

 Courier 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [noa.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158/http:/typophile.com/files/noa.jpg) | 431.71 KB |
author: jbm15

comments.content:
|NOA| appears to be based on /a customizaton of Colonna:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/colonna-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/colonna-mt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/colonna-mt/")

|RELAXATION| appears to be some variant of Courier:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/Courier/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Courier/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/Courier/fonts/")

The text directly beneath |RELAXATION| appears to be Futura Condensed (though it is hard be certain given the size of the type in the sample):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/")

Thank you so much! Great help.

All the best to you kthomps5!
